data.name: Longer Words
data.description: Increase the average length of words by 0.1 characters.

data.name: Monkey Typist
data.description: Increase your cash per second by $10. (He's been practicing on moneytype)

data.name: Streak Bonus
data.description: Increases the bonus you receive for typing multiple words in a row without mistakes.

data.name: Automatic Keyboard
data.description: Increase your cash per second by $75.

data.name: Word Printer
data.description: Increase your cash per second by $250.
